title: HAP 75 - Now I Have a Rival - The Two Amy Garveys
itunes:title: HAP 75 - Now I Have a Rival - The Two Amy Garveys
description: Marcus Garvey’s two wives, Amy Ashwood Garvey and Amy Jacques Garvey, establish themselves as activists in their own right and bring feminism into the Pan-African movement.
content:encoded: Marcus Garvey’s two wives, Amy Ashwood Garvey and Amy Jacques Garvey, establish themselves as activists in their own right and bring feminism into the Pan-African movement.
itunes:subtitle: Marcus Garvey’s two wives, Amy Ashwood Garvey and Amy Jacques Garvey, establish themselves as activists in their own right and bring feminism into the Pan-African movement.
itunes:summary: Marcus Garvey’s two wives, Amy Ashwood Garvey and Amy Jacques Garvey, establish themselves as activists in their own right and bring feminism into the Pan-African movement.
itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
